name: Invokers Demo
description:
Invokers takes place in a future where robotics thrives in the security industry and corporations and billionaires have profited and amassed huge economic growth. In this world, the rich get richer and the poor get poorer. A crew of Invokers rise up and execute heists to survive in the financially played game of cat and mouse.

Classes

Hacker - Shows additional information

Ghost - Invisibility gadget

Brute - Armor Kit

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • F - Melee
  • Q - Throw Bomb
  • C - Crouch
  • V - Activate Invisibility (Ghost only)
  • 1 - Switch to Pistol
  • 2 - Switch to Rifle

Instructions: Extract all files from zip into a folder and double-click the InvokersDemo.exe
